NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Pharmacist and Multipurpose Health Worker Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 13, 2025, 17:57 IST
 Ministry of AYUSH
 2 Jobs |  Posted On : 13-Aug-2025 |  Kerala |  Salary : 13,500 to 14,700




FOLLOW

National Ayush Mission Kerala (NAM) has announced the official notification care 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Pharmacist and Multipurpose Health Worker Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Pharm, ANM can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Kerala

NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Pharmacist 	01	B.Pharm
Multipurpose Health Worker	01	ANM

Age Limit for the NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 40 years.

Selection Process for the NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 13,500 /- per month
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 14,700 /- per month.

Application fee for the NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the NAM Kerala Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Pharmacist notification 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form along with the relevant documents to the address given below.

Address

The Office of The National Ayush Mission District Program Manager, Ramavarma District Ayurveda Hospital, Thrissur

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	11-08-2025
Last Date of Application	18-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
